EmailTemplate.name: WO 36 Hours since moved to 01 - Waiting for payment
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order - 36 hours since moved to 01 - Waiting for Payment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
It's been 36 hours since Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} was sent to the customer and we haven't received payment. Please follow up with {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} to avoid delays.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
